Package main

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
main.Farm
Direct Known Subclasses:
DairyFarm, FactoryFarm, OutbackRanchFarm, PlantationFarm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
The Farm of our Farm Simulator. The farm is the space where crops are grown and animals are raised. It is owned by a farmer and contains a certain amount of money.
Version:
1.0, May 2020.
Author:
Alina Phang, Jesper Slager

      Parameters:
